name: Star Chart (itch)
description:
Star Chart is a game about exploring a part of the universe. As humanity's first colony ship, launch from planet to planet, leaving your mark as you make your way to the next black hole that will inevitably lead you to another new part of the galaxy.

Your colony ship uses planets to course-correct. Time your burns to aim for your next waypoint. Play through 4 (currently) different levels, each with their own routes and planetary formations to discover.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
 This game marks me and my friend's first released title and also our first game jam! We are super excited to hear what you guys think, so we hope you'll give us a chance by downloading, playing and rating Star Chart!

Changelog:

v1.02

- Fixed dev name visible for a level

- Added extra credits and an itch.io badge

v1.01

- Fixed a broken ending sequence
